sourcesContent:
EVP Recorder

Capture and analyze Electronic Voice Phenomena.

@switch (state()) { @case ('idle') {

Press record to capture ambient audio.

Analysis Cost: {{ analysisCost }} NC

} @case ('recording') {

RECORDING...

} @case ('analyzing') {

ANALYZING STATIC...

} @case ('result') { @if (analysisResult(); as result) {

Deciphered Message:

"{{ result.transcription }}"

Analysis Confidence: {{ (result.confidence * 100).toFixed(0) }}%

} } } @if(error()) {

{{ error() }}

}
@if (state() === 'idle' || state() === 'recording') { } @else { }
